Package clientGUIControllers

Class RegistrationFormController

java.lang.Object
clientGUIControllers.RegistrationFormController
public class RegistrationFormController extends Object
This class is a JavaFX controller class for a registration form GUI to create new registration as registeredCustomer or as a Subscriber for user and add the user all the permissions as registeredCustomer or as a Subscriber. It uses the JavaFX API to set up and initialize the form's various components, such as text fields, images, and labels, and sets their properties and visibility according to the registration type. The class also handle logic for determining whether the form is for registering a new subscriber or a new registered customer, and sets form fields and visibility accordingly. Additionally, it handles communication with a server to retrieve and update data, such as user , registeredCustomer and subscriber details. this class sets error and help labels, as well as defaulting user-specific fields with user-specific data. *

  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationFormController

      public RegistrationFormController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      The initialize method is called when the fxml file is loaded. sets images,buttons,text fields according to the registration type.. sets general user details, and hides the those extra details. sets the title label and subscriber details label based on whether the registration is for subscriber or registered customer. sets the credit card number, CVV, month and year based on the registered customer details. sets the max subscriber number based on the max subscriber number in the database if the registration for subscriber. This method organizes the registration form according to the type of registration.

    • addYearsToYearList

      private void addYearsToYearList()
      This method add to expire year list more years.

    • viewPressed

      void viewPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the "View" button is pressed. Makes the extra details visible and shows the "Hide" button while hiding the "View" button. The user pressed on this button to see all general user's for registration details.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object associated with the button press.

    • hidePressed

      void hidePressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the "hide" button is pressed. Hides the extra details and shows the "View" button while hiding the "Hide" button. The user pressed on this button to hide all general user's for registration details.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object associated with the button press.

    • extreDetailsIsVisible

      private void extreDetailsIsVisible(boolean val)
      Sets the visibility of the general user's details fields.
      Parameters:
      val - boolean value that indicates whether the details fields should be visible (true) or not (false)

    • makeregistrationPressed

      void makeregistrationPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the "Make Registration" button is pressed. Creates a new RegisteredCustomer object and checks the user's input fields. If the input fields are valid, it updates the worker's second role in the workerPermission's table and update the Subscriber details in the Subscriber's table and in the RegisteredCustomer's table also sends a SMS to the phone number and an email to the email address, And finally, it sets the user status to "Active" for subscriber or "Not Approved" for Registered customer.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object associated with the button press.

    • AbstractTest

      private boolean AbstractTest(String testFieldInput, int minBound, int maxBound, String TextFieldName, String charBound, String ErrorMsg)
      Performs an input integrity check on the given text field input. The method checks that the input is valid according to the type of characters and possible input length.
      Parameters:
      testFieldInput - The input to be checked.
      minBound - The minimum allowed length of the input.
      maxBound - The maximum allowed length of the input.
      TextFieldName - The name of the text field that the input belongs to.
      charBound - The regular expression pattern that the input must match.
      ErrorMsg - The error message to be displayed if the input is invalid.
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise.

    • checkFieldsInfo

      public boolean checkFieldsInfo()
      Checks the validity of the input in all fields.
      Returns:
      true if all fields have valid input, false otherwise.

    • checkString

      boolean checkString(String matchingChars, String toCheck)
      checks the given string against the given regular expression pattern. Pattern Class - Defines a pattern (to be used in a search). Matcher Class - Used to search for the pattern.
      Parameters:
      matchingChars - The regular expression pattern to match against.
      toCheck - The string to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the string matches the pattern, false otherwise.

    • emailValidityInput

      private boolean emailValidityInput()
      Checks the validity of the input in the email field. The email must contain a @ symbol, a dot (.) symbol, the dot must be at least one character after the @ symbol, the string must not contain any spaces.
      Returns:
      true if the input is valid, false otherwise.

    • backPressed

      void backPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the back button is pressed. Clears the user for registration and navigates to the MakeRegistrationScreen(make registration start page).
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object that represents the button press event.

    • helpPreesed

      void helpPreesed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the help button is pressed. Shows a help message to guide the user in filling in the registration form details.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object that represents the button press event.

    • logOutPressed

      void logOutPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the log out button is pressed. Clears the user for registration(set null) and navigates to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object that represents the button press event.

    • xPressed

      void xPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the event when the X button is pressed. Clears the user for registration(set null) and closes the current window.
      Parameters:
      event - The ActionEvent object that represents the button press event.

    • getSubscriberMax

      public static int getSubscriberMax()
      Gets the maximum subscriber number.
      Returns:
      the maximum subscriber number.

    • setSubscriberMax

      public void setSubscriberMax(int subscriberMax)
      Sets the maximum subscriber number.
      Parameters:
      subscriberMax - the new maximum subscriber number.

    • setImages

      private void setImages()
      Set images
